name: Songwood
description:
Though a century has passed, no one has set foot in the decrepit forest since the mysterious incident... Until now. Use your kantele to create music and bring back the magic and life of the forest. Play as the bard, Van as she explores the mysterious woods and find the magical notes so she can rejuvenate this once barren land and discover the secrets tucked between the branches.

 

A beautiful, hand painted world. 

A poetic story inspired by Finnish folklore. 

Wonderful music. 

Play your magical kantele and create songs. 

Use magic to grow whatever you need to traverse the world. 

Two distinct modes – Story and Creative. 

Narrative Design

Alex Morana

Programmer

Katya Sievert

Lead Designer

Producer
